Benefits

  • Gets You More Timely Security And/or Police Response
  • Makes It Easy To Get A Rapid Response To A Threatening Situation
  • Avoid Panic Button Confusion
  • Quickly Get Security Onsite, Ontime

Firearm & Weapon Detection

Detects guns, baseball bats, knifes, batons, machete etc immediately when visible on camera

Intruder Detection

Detects people while avoiding other common false alarms for movement like machinery, vehicles, animals, wind / trees.

Active Shooter Response

Constantly analyses each security camera frame for possible weapon threats and intruders. The software algorithm is trained to identify what is a gun and what is not.

Instant Notification

When the software detects a visible weapon or intruder, it issues an immediate alert to designated personnel with the exact location, firearm type, and information about the assailant(s).

Real-time Tracking

Real-time alerts continue to track moving threats, enabling the organisation respond to the threat until the incident is resolved.

**Demonstrations at installed sites

About

Weapon detection software that turns any CCTV camera into a gun-detecting security system. The cloud based program identifies weapons as soon as they’re visible and immediately notifies security personnel. This allows response to threats in real-time.
© AI CCTV Australia
